name: Make shopping cart checkout

testSteps.description: 1: Make shopping cart checkout ({first_name=David, last_name=Chango, e_mail=dchango@gmail.com, telephone=0984593359, address_1=madrid y spain, city=Ambato, post_code=180103, country=Ecuador, region_or_state=Tungurahua})

children.description: Given User with one or more products in his shopping cart
When he select the Shopping Cart option
And he clicks the Checkout button
And he selects Guest Checkout as Checkout Option selection
And he insert the informative data: David Chango dchango@gmail.com 0984593359 madrid y spain Ambato 180103 Ecuador Tungurahua
And he fills the rest of the formulary
Then he sees the order validation message

userStory.storyName: Checkout shopping cart as guest user
userStory.displayName: Checkout shopping cart as guest user

title: Make shopping cart checkout

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User with one or more products in his shopping cart
When he select the Shopping Cart option
And he clicks the Checkout button
And he selects Guest Checkout as Checkout Option selection
And he insert the informative data: <first_name> <last_name> <e_mail> <telephone> <address_1> <city> <post_code> <country> <region_or_state>
And he fills the rest of the formulary
And he confirms his order
Then he sees the order validation message
